text: Clear and Present Danger is a 1994 American spy movie. The movie is about agents in the CIA, FBI and murder around Washington, D.C. and Colombia involving the Cali drug cartel and corrupt powerful American politicians and bureaucrats. Harrison Ford plays Jack Ryan, who has become the Director of the CIA. Anne Archer plays his wife Cathy Ryan. Thora Birch plays his daughter Sally Ryan. Other actors who play in the movie include James Earl Jones, Willem Dafoe, Harris Yulin and James Cromwell. This movie was released August 3, 1994. The run time is 141 minutes. Its reviews were excellent. It made a lot of money at the box office. It is the sequel of the 1992 movie Patriot Games. == Other websites == * * Category:1994 crime movies Category:1994 drama movies Category:1994 action movies Category:1990s sequel movies Category:1990s spy movies Category:American action movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:American sequel movies Category:American spy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies about terrorism Category:Murder in movies Category:Movies about drugs Category:Movies set in the 1980s Category:Movies set in Washington, D.C. title: Clear and Present Danger
